tool.name: Chado load trees
tool.command:
@AUTH@
chakin phylogeny load_tree '$newick' '$analysis_id'
#if $name: --name '$name' #end if #if $xref_db: --xref_db '$xref_db' #end if #if $xref_accession: --xref_accession '$xref_accession' #end if #if $match_on_name: $match_on_name #end if #if $prefix: --prefix '$prefix' #end if
| jq -S . > $results

param.name: newick
param.label: Newick
param.help: Newick file to load (or directory containing multiple newick files to load)

param.name: name
param.label: Name
param.help: The name given to the phylotree entry in the database

param.name: xref_db
param.label: Xref db
param.help: The name of the db to link dbxrefs for the trees

param.name: xref_accession
param.label: Xref Accession
param.help: The accession to use for dbxrefs for the trees (assumed same as name unless otherwise specified)

param.name: match_on_name
param.label: Match On Name
param.help: Match polypeptide features using their name instead of their uniquename

param.name: prefix
param.label: Prefix
param.help: Comma-separated list of prefix to be removed from identifiers (e.g species prefixes when using loading OrthoFinder output)

tool.help:
Load a phylogenetic tree (Newick format) into Chado db
@HELP@
